timeOffRequestId.description: Unique identifier of this time off request.

totalHours.description: Total amount of hours inside this time off request.

timeOffRequestDayId.description: Unique identifier of specific day inside time off request model.

date.description: Date for Time off request day

hours.description: Total amount of hours for this day.

startTime.description: Exact start date and time for this day

endTime.description: Exact end date and time for this day

days.description: Collection of days for this time off request.

comment.description: Additional comment for this time off request. Optional. Currently not available in Get Employee Time Off Requests by EmployeeId.

status.description:
Status of this time off request.
Status could be Pending, Approved, Denied, Removed, Canceled or empty

createdDate.description: Date and time when this time off request is created.

statusUpdateTime.description: Date and time when is the status of this time off request updated.

statusUpdateByEmployeeId.description: Unique identifier of employee who is updated status.

createdByEmployeeId.description: Unique identifier of employee who is created this time off request.

schema.description: Employee Time Off Request model represents information about time off requests for specific employee.

id.description: Unique identifier of the person in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

legalFirstName.description: First name used on the person's W-2 tax form.

legalLastName.description: Last name used on the person's W-2 tax form.

socialSecurityNumber.description:
Social security number of the person.
This data will only be available for Get Person (returns single Person object) APIs and will always be null for Get Persons (returns list of Person) APIs.

birthDate.description:
Date of birth of the person following the ISO 8601 standard.
This data will only be available for Get Person (returns single Person object) APIs and will always be null for Get Persons (returns list of Person) APIs.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

ethnicity.description: Enumeration of valid Ethnicity Type values.

maritalStatus.description: Enumeration of valid Marital Status values.

demographicData.description: The Demographic Data model represents a Person's confidential Demographic Information.

isTobaccoUser.description: Whether person is a tobacco user.

disability.description: Enumeration of valid Disability Status values.

benefitData.description: The Benefit Data model represents a Person's Benefits Data.

id.description: Unique identifier of the emergency contact in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

firstName.description: First name of the emergency contact.

middleName.description: Middle name of the emergency contact.

lastName.description: Last name of the emergency contact.

countryCode.description: Country code for the phone number.

areaCode.description: Area code for the phone number.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Phone Type values.

items.description: The Phone model represents Phone information.

phones.description: List of type Phone containing phone numbers for the emergency contact.

items.description: The Emergency Contact Data model represents a Person's Emergency Contacts Data.

emergencyContactData.description:
List of type EmergencyContactData containing a Person's emergency contacts data.
This data will only be available for Get Person (returns single Person object) APIs and will always be null for Get Persons (returns list of Person) APIs.

veteran.description: Enumeration of valid Veteran Status values.

dischargeDate.description:
Discharge date of the person from the military per US protected veteran definition. 
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.
             Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

isArmedForcesServiceMedalVeteran.description:
Whether person qualifies as a medal recipient per US protected veteran definitions.
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.

isDisabledVeteran.description:
Whether person qualifies as a disabled veteran per US protected veteran definitions.
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.

isOtherProtectedVeteran.description:
Whether person qualifies as an other protected veteran per US protected veteran definitions.
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.

isRecentlySeparatedVeteran.description:
Whether person qualifies as a recently separated veteran per US protected veteran definitions.
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.

isVietnamEra.description:
Whether person qualifies as a Vietnam era veteran per US protected veteran definitions.
Available only if person's veteran status is 'true'.

isSpecialDisabled.description:
A special disabled veteran is an individual who is legally approved for financial compensation
 in accordance with laws provided by the Veterans Administration for disabilities that are rated at least 30 percent. .

militaryData.description: The Military Data model represents a Person's military information.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Social Media Type Values.

url.description: URL to access the person's social media account.

items.description:
The Social Media Data model represents information about a Person's Social Media accounts.
Provides links to Person's Social Media accounts.

socialMediaData.description: List of type SocialMediaData containing the Person's social media information.

id.description: ID of the resource being referenced. This is generated by Paycor.

url.description: URL to reach the resource being referenced

employees.description: The Resource Reference model is used to provide URL links to resources.

items.description:
The Employee Assignment model represents information regarding the legal entity or specific FEIN the employee is assigned too.
Provides link to associated Employee information.

employeeAssignments.description: List of type EmployeeAssignment containing the person's employee assignments.

streetLine1.description: First line of street address information.

streetLine2.description: Additional line of street address information.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Type of Address values.

items.description: The Person Address model represents the Person's Address information.

addresses.description: List of type Address containing the person's addresses.

countryCode.description: Country code for the phone number.

areaCode.description: Area code for the phone number.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Phone Type values.

items.description: The Phone model represents Phone information.

phones.description: List of type Phone containing the person's phone numbers.

id.description: ID of the resource being referenced. This is generated by Paycor.

url.description: URL to reach the resource being referenced

tenants.description: The Resource Reference model is used to provide URL links to resources.

schema.description:
Each Person is associated with one or more Employees within one Tenant. An Employee works for a single Legal Entity within the Tenant.  If a person works
for multiple Legal Entities within a Tenant, they will be associated with multiple Employee records - but will only have a single Person record in the Paycor system.
Provides links to the Person's associated Employee, Legal Entity and Tenant information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the employee in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

employeeNumber.description: Unique number of the employee in the tenant. Generated by Paycor.

badgeNumber.description: Employee's assigned badge number - currently unavailable

type.description: Enumeration of valid email type values.

hireDate.description:
Date the employee was hired.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

adjustedHireDate.description:
Adjusted hire date is used when the employee's hire date does not accurately reflect benefits eligibility because an employee may have left, 
been rehired or taken a Leave of Absence. This provides an alternative date for the employee's accruals to be calculated on.
 Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

terminationDate.description:
Date the employee was terminated.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

reHireDate.description:
Re-hire date of the employee. Terminated employees can be rehired.
 Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

seniorityDate.description:
Date on which the calculation of an employee's seniority is based.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

employmentDateData.description: The Employment Date Data represents the Employee's Employment Date information.

jobTitle.description: Name of the employee's job title.

effectiveStartDate.description:
Date the employee position data takes effect.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

effectiveEndDate.description:
Date the employee position data is no longer in effect.
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ  (ISO-8601 standard)

payGroupId.description: Unique identifier of the pay group in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

id.description: Unique identifier of the manager in Paycor's system. Generated by Paycor.

employeeNumber.description: Employee number of the employee's manager.

manager.description:
The Manager model represents information about the Employee's Manager.
Provides link to the Manager's Employee level information.

positionData.description: The Employee Position Data model represents the Employee's Position related data.

status.description: Enumeration of valid Employment Status values.

flsa.description: Enumeration of valid Types of Fair Labor Standards Act (FLSA) employment values.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Employment Type values.

statusData.description: The Employee Status Data model represents Employee Employment Status information.

streetLine1.description: First line of street address information.

type.description: Enumeration of valid Type of Work Location Address values.

workLocation.description: The Employee Work Location Data model represents the Employee's Work Location related data.

schema.description:
The Employee model represents all Employee related information.
 Provides links to the Employee's associated Person, Legal Entity, Department, Earning, Deduction, Tax, Direct Deposit, Pay Rat and Custom Field information.

customFieldId.description: Unique identifier of the Custom Field. Generated by Paycor.

legalEntityId.description: LegalEntityId that created the Custom Field.

fieldName.description: Name of the custom field, set at the Legal Entity level.

value.description:
Value of the custom field set for this employee.
Expected Datatype could be string, float, or date - depending on the setup of the LegalEntity Custom Field.

isRequired.description: Whether this custom field is required to be setup on each Employee.

customFieldsOptions.description: Valid list of values for a custom field (for appropriate types)

dateModified.description: Date when custom field value was last modified.

id.description: ID of the resource being referenced. This is generated by Paycor.

url.description: URL to reach the resource being referenced

employee.description: The Resource Reference model is used to provide URL links to resources.

schema.description: Allows reading the value of a Custom Field set on a particular Employee.
